title: Llama 3.3 just dropped — is it better than GPT-4 or Claude-Sonnet-3.5?

title2: Llama 3.3 just dropped — is it better than GPT-4 or Claude-Sonnet-3.5?
description: The new Llama 3.3 model has a significant improvement in performance, cost efficiency, and multilingual support. Here's how it compares to GPT-4 and Claude 3.5.
